body:
* Netflix Inc - ‍intends to use net proceeds from offering for general corporate purposes​

* Netflix - ‍interest rate, redemption provisions, maturity date and other terms will be determined by negotiations between co, initial purchasers​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
header: BRIEF-Netflix announces proposed $1.6 billion offering of senior notes

body: * Says ‍announced pricing of an offering of $1.6 billion aggregate principal amount of 4.875% senior notes due 2028​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
header: BRIEF-Netflix prices $1.6 bln offering of senior notes
